messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
There's a shooting going on, local shooting.
Shooting where?
In the IHOP.
In the IHOP?
In the IHOP. Automatic weapons.
How many are inside?
We've got one guy going in. Now he's coming back out with a gun. He's shooting people in the parking lot.
He's got an automatic weapon?
Yes, automatic weapons.
Okay, we're on the way. Are you in a safe place?
Oh no, he's shooting at us now!
All right, see if you can get to a safe place.
He's shooting at us with automatic weapons!
Is it a long gun?
Yes, one guy with an automatic weapon. He's shooting everybody.
Can you describe him?
He's wearing a red shirt.
Red shirt and a long gun. Understood. We have officers on the way.
I'm at a local barbecue nearby, not at IHOP.
Okay, you're at the local barbecue. Are you in a safe place?
Yes, she's in a safe place.
What's your name, please?
Ralph Swagler, Local's Barbecue.
Ralph, what's your phone number?
Can you still see the shooter?
No, he may be over by the Wells Fargo building or going towards Raley's.
You only saw one guy with a gun?
Yes, one guy with a gun, red shirt, automatic weapon.
Keep yourself in a safe place and lock your doors, okay?
Yes, the doors are locked.
911, are you reporting the shooting at IHOP?
Yes, I am. This is Casino Fandango. I heard the pops and saw him run out of the building shooting people.
You have people down in the parking lot?
Yes, and I heard he shot himself.
Do you see the shooter now?
No, I don't see him.
Where was the shooter last seen?
By a blue van between Local's Barbecue and IHOP. He shot himself in the head.
Several people are down, right?
Yes.
We're getting help on the way.
Thank you.
